Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Video Decoder API

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_SET_VIDEO_MODE. More...

#include <bsp_videoDecoder.h>

Detailed Description

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_SET_VIDEO_MODE.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::standard

Video decoder video standard.

When set to FVID2_STD_AUTO_DETECT the video resolution will be auto-detected but user will still need to provide other parameters like videoIfWidth, videoDataFormat, videoIfMode For valid values see Fvid2_Standard.

Int32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoAutoDetectTimeout

Auto-detect timeout, when auto-detecting standard in OS ticks. To wait forever, need to provide FVID2_TIMEOUT_FOREVER.

Valid only when

Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams.standard = FVID2_STD_AUTO_DETECT

OR

Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams.videoSystem = BSP_VID_DEC_VIDEO_SYSTEM_AUTO_DETECT

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoCropEnable

Applicable only for D1/CIF capture input. Crops 720 to 704 and 360 to 352 at video decoder. Only applied if video decoder supports this mode.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoDataFormat

RGB or YUV data format. valid values are given below
FVID2_DF_YUV422P, ( 'P' is not relavent for input data format)
FVID2_DF_YUV444P, ( 'P' is not relavent for input data format)
FVID2_DF_RGB24_888.

For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoIfMode

Multiplexing mode, line mux or pixel mux or split line mode. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfMode.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoIfWidth

8 or 16 or 24-bit video interface mode. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfWidth.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoModeParams::videoSystem

Video system, NTSC or PAL or NONE or Auto-detect.

When set to BSP_VID_DEC_VIDEO_SYSTEM_AUTO_DETECT the video system NTSC or PAL will be auto-detected but user will still need to provide other parameters like videoIfWidth, videoDataFormat, videoIfMode, standard For valid values see Bsp_VidDecVideoSystem.
